# xtools

**xtools** is a Python wrapper around [XTools](https://xtools.readthedocs.io/en/stable/index.html)â€™ API.

Note this project is not affiliated with nor endorsed by XTools.

## Install

    pip install xtools

### Requirements

Python 3.5+.

## Usage

[Read the docs](https://python-xtools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).
